messages: Most people are willing to change, not because they see the light, but because they feel the heat. - Joe Moore #quotes #quote
If you can spend a perfectly useless afternoon in a perfectly useless manner, you have learned how to live. - Lin Yutang #quotes #quote
A small town is a place where everyone knows whose check is good and whose husband is not. - Sid Ascher #quotes #quote
You can bear anything if it isn't your fault. - K.F. Gerould #quotes #quote
Democracy is the only system that persists in asking the powers that be whether they are the powers that ought to be. Sydney J. Harris
Most people are willing to change, not because they see the light, but because they feel the heat. - Joe Moore #quotes #quote
